mapper.update: update product_property set name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, detail = #{detail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, product_id = #{productId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, delete_time = #{deleteTime,jdbcType=INTEGER}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, name, detail, product_id, delete_time, update_time from product_property
